name: Lost Stars
description:
Description

Very brief unfinished visual novel for My First Game Jam Summer 2021. You play as a thief searching for something that can make you rich, but you might end up finding a friend instead! Or you could avoid friendship and just steal stuff if that's what you like. The theme of the jam was "free", and the game is about a girl who has been trapped in her room for a few thousand years. In the finished game, you will be able to free her if you make the right choices.

Gameplay is only about 10 minutes, since I used my time to learn Ren'py, write a script, design and draw sprites for two characters. So far you can only achieve 1 ending, though there are at least 3 planned.

(You may have to turn up the volume in the options menu. I set it to mute and forgot about it.)

Credits

GUI is from https://scribbles.itch.io/lunar-magic
Music is from https://pocket-se.info/
